akn:section.akn:heading: Areas subject to national need recommendation process

akn:content.akn:p: § 3231. Areas subject to national need recommendation process The process contained in this subchapter shall apply to all public lands within Alaska except for lands within units of the National Park System and the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. (Pub. L. 96–487, title XV, § 1501, Dec. 2, 1980, 94 Stat. 2549.)
